snippet: Democrats can’t match the Koch brothers’ unlimited money, but they can use their political pulpits to fight for a few basic principles.
abstract: Editorial praises effort lead by Sen Harry Reid to expose and criticize billionaires like the Koch brothers who are using their wealth to dismantle Democratic initiatives and give Republicans control of Senate in midterm elections; holds it is high time Democrats fought back against the corrupting influence of wealthy industrialists who only seek to further their financial gain.
lead_paragraph: Democrats can’t match the Koch brothers’ unlimited money, but they can use their political pulpits to fight for a few basic principles.

headline.main: The Democrats Stand Up to the Kochs
headline.print_headline: The Democrats Stand Up to the Kochs
